[Y]Classroom Setup
[W]Pair programming and rotating roles.
[c][m.]
[W]One learner types while another
[W]reviews, then they swap every short
[W]interval.
[W]Visible goals and short demos keep
[W]sessions focused and energetic.
[c][m.]
[G]- Coder and reviewer roles.
[G]- Short challenge cycles.
[G]- Public progress board.
[m][m-]
[Y]PRACTICE
[C]Frequent swaps improve attention.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
